We arrive in Tokyo at 8 AM.
exampleRus: Мы прилетаем в Токио в 8 утра.

exampleEng: Baggage allowance is 23 kg per person.
exampleRus: Норма провоза багажа — 23 кг на человека.

exampleEng: Book your business trip two weeks ahead.
exampleRus: Забронируйте деловую поездку за две недели.

exampleEng: Cross the border with valid documents.
Present your boarding pass at the gate.
Choose a carrier with flexible refund policy.
exampleRus: Выберите перевозчика с гибкой политикой возврата.

exampleEng: A health certificate may be required.
Check-in time is 3 PM.
Check-out time is 11 AM.
Coach new employees.
Business class offers greater comfort.
Confirm your hotel booking 48 hours ahead.
Keep the confirmation email for check-in.
exampleRus: Сохраните письмо с подтверждением для регистрации.

exampleEng: We can accommodate 200 guests.
The hotel offers excellent amenities.
The concierge arranged airport transfer.
Please book a room for the client.
You may cancel up to 24 hours before.
exampleRus: Вы можете отменить за 24 часа до заезда.

exampleEng: Check-in time is 3 PM.
Check-out time is 11 AM.
Ask the concierge for recommendations.
Please confirm your reservation by email.
exampleRus: Пожалуйста, подтвердите бронирование по электронной почте.

exampleEng: A cot was added to the room.
A courtesy van takes guests to the airport.
exampleRus: Бесплатный микроавтобус отвозит гостей в аэропорт.

exampleEng: The customer is always right.
Make a deposit to your account.
We offer a 10% discount.
Contact the front desk for assistance.
exampleRus: Обратитесь на стойку регистрации за помощью.

exampleEng: The guest checked in early.
Their hospitality is excellent.
The hotel hosted the international summit.
The hostel offers budget accommodation.
The country inn has 20 guest rooms.
We can accommodate 200 guests.
The aisle seat is preferred for quick exits.
exampleRus: Место у прохода предпочтительнее для быстрого выхода.

exampleEng: Allocate resources wisely.
Check the arrival board for updates.
exampleRus: Проверьте табло прибытия для получения информации.

exampleEng: The train will arrive at platform 3.
Passengers should assemble at gate 12.
The assembly point is near the main entrance.
exampleRus: Место сбора находится у главного входа.

exampleEng: Baggage claim is on the lower level.
exampleRus: Выдача багажа находится на нижнем уровне.

exampleEng: Passengers may board starting at 6:30 AM.
Boarding closes 15 minutes before departure.
exampleRus: Посадка заканчивается за 15 минут до отправления.

exampleEng: Book your train ticket in advance.
The flight was cancelled due to weather.
The carrier confirmed the booking.
Carry-on bags must fit in the overhead bin.
exampleRus: Ручная кладь должна помещаться в верхний отсек.

exampleEng: Buses circulate every 15 minutes.
Employees commute by train daily.
exampleRus: Сотрудники ежедневно добираются на работу поездом.

exampleEng: The commuter line runs every 20 minutes.
Confirm your travel arrangements early.
Peak-hour congestion delays deliveries.
exampleRus: Заторы в часы пик задерживают доставку.

exampleEng: Connect to the conference call.
The airline provides in-flight meals.
The menu looks very appetizing.
The aroma of fresh coffee fills the café.
Beverages are included in the lunch package.
Pay the utility bill on time.
exampleRus: Оплачивайте счет за коммунальные услуги вовремя.

exampleEng: Book a table for ten for Friday.
exampleRus: Забронируйте столик на десять человек на пятницу.

exampleEng: The restaurant has a capacity of 80 guests.
Carryout orders account for 30% of sales.
Pay the cashier before leaving.
We cater corporate lunches and dinners.
exampleRus: Мы организуем корпоративные обеды и ужины.

exampleEng: Health certificate must be displayed.
exampleRus: Санитарный сертификат должен быть выставлен на видном месте.

exampleEng: A service charge of 15% was applied.
The chef prepares fresh daily specials.
The restaurant closes at 11 PM.
The menu features international cuisine.
The customer is always right.
Local delicacies were served at the banquet.
exampleRus: На банкете были поданы местные деликатесы.

exampleEng: The catered meal was absolutely delicious.
Dessert is included in the business lunch.
Clients often dine in private rooms.
exampleRus: Клиенты часто обедают в отдельных залах.

exampleEng: The amusement park hosted a company event.
The announcer introduced the keynote speaker.
Appetizers were served before the banquet.
HR arranged the year-end celebration.
exampleRus: Отдел кадров организовал праздник по итогам года.

exampleEng: The auditorium holds 500 people.
A banquet was held for all partners.
exampleRus: Банкет был проведён для всех партнёров.

exampleEng: The team event was beneficial for morale.
exampleRus: Командное мероприятие благотворно повлияло на моральный дух.

exampleEng: Book the venue three months in advance.
Add all events to the corporate calendar.
exampleRus: Добавьте все события в корпоративный календарь.

exampleEng: The celebration honored top performers.
The awards ceremony starts at 7 PM.
A professional choreographed the stage show.
The choreographer led rehearsals all week.
Teams collaborated to plan the summit.
The event commemorated 25 years of business.
Commencement of the conference is at 9 AM.
The compere introduced each speaker.
A concert was organized for the gala.
Directors will confer after the presentation.
Guests congregated in the main hall.
